mapper.select: select a.rank_id,a.rank_name,a.total_vote as vote_count,a.total_love as love_count,a.publish_time, b.rs_id,b.song_id,b.ranking,b.rank_update_time,c.song_name from (select p.rank_id,p.rank_name,ifnull(sum(v.vote),0) as total_vote,p.publish_time, ifnull(sum(l.love),0) as total_love from personal_rank as p left join vote_record as v on v.rank_id=p.rank_id left join love_record as l on l.rank_id=p.rank_id where p.user_id=#{userId} group by p.rank_id, p.rank_name, p.publish_time order by publish_time asc limit #{pageSize} offset #{offset}) a left join rank_song as b on a.rank_id = b.rank_id left join song as c on c.song_id=b.song_id order by b.rank_update_time asc, b.ranking asc

select a.rank_id,a.rank_name,b.rs_id,b.song_id,b.ranking,b.rank_update_time ,c.song_name from personal_rank as a left join rank_song as b on a.rank_id = b.rank_id left join song as c on b.song_id = c.song_id where a.rank_id=#{rankId}
select singer_id,singer_name from singer where category_id=#{categoryId} and singer_status=1
select song_id,song.song_name from song where singer_id=#{singerId} and song_status=1
